typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EnglishProductCategoryName as string,
		Model as string,
		CustomerKey as string,
		Region as string,
		Age as string,
		IncomeGroup as string,
		CalendarYear as string,
		FiscalYear as string,
		Month as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(AmountwithTax = round(toFloat(Amount)*1.25)) ~> AddedAmountAfterAddingTax
AddedAmountAfterAddingTax split(greater(toFloat(AmountwithTax), 4000),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(TaxedAmountGreaterThan4000, TaxedAmountLesserOrEqual4000)
